front.title: Bay Networks SS7-Internet Access Signaling Protocol

abstract.t: This memo describes the Bay Networks SS7 Access Signaling Protocol(ASP). This protocol is used between an SS7-Internet Gateway and aRemote Access Server/Network Access Server (NAS). The protocolsupports call setup and termination by both Gateway and AccessServer, and includes circuit management functions such as circuitblocking and procedures for registration of the Access Server.
